name: Underworld Foes
description:
Gameplay About Game

Our world is invaded by unidentified creatures.

All we know is that when they see you, they will do everything they can to kill you.

There is only one person who can save the world and that person is you.

You have to fend off the creatures with a powerful gun with an empowered ammo.

You have only one mission to save the world.

And that is to kill the Dragon-like Beast.

The world needs YOU and EVERYONE is counting on you.

How To Play

-Do parkour and reach the end

-Move : WASD, Jump : Space, Fire: Left Mouse Click

-Drones have 3 hit health

-Laser Cubes have 2-3 hit health

-Stone platforms disappear a certain of time when you stand on

-Columns moves down a certain of time when you stand on

-Lava is instantly kill you

-After the first jump you have a acceleration (Like Bunny)

-You can't die in the boss stage but your score decreases when hit by the enemy

-(!)If you have fps problems change Quailty

-Recommended setting is default setting

Please leave a comment and rate the Game
